titles.title: It's Your Heart; It's Your Heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's your heart, it's your heart,
It's your heart in this matter that counts,
O my son. (x2)
So let your windows of heaven all be opened again,
And be healed by His wonderful love. (x2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Many things you can see
Will take your eyes off of me;
Many windows there are
To draw you so far
Away from what the Lord
Would have you to be:
Let your windows of heaven
Be opened again.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So be careful as you choose
And you'll be sure not to lose
Your new-found sight of My purpose
As I deal with you;
As you keep your heart right,
You'll see with new sight,
And your windows of heaven
Will be opened again.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Some did look through a window,
To judge and to scorn.
Another sat in His window
And after death was reborn.
But there's a window that's above,
And as you choose to live and love,
That blessed window of heaven
Will be opened again.
